name: GKGameCenterViewControllerState
desc: The type of content for the view controller to present.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: The view controller should present the default screen.

items.name: case leaderboards
items.desc: The view controller should present leaderboard sets or leaderboards if there are no sets.

items.name: case achievements
items.desc: The view controller should present a list of achievements.

items.name: case challenges
items.desc: The view controller should present a list of challenges.

items.name: case localPlayerProfile
items.desc: The view controller should present the local playerâ€™s profile.

items.name: case dashboard
items.desc: The view controller should present the dashboard.

items.name: case localPlayerFriendsList
items.desc: The view controller should present the friends list.
